00024 #ifndef _MSDATACACHE_HPP_
00025 #define _MSDATACACHE_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "MSDataAnalyzer.hpp"
00029 #include "SpectrumInfo.hpp"
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace analysis {
00034 
00035 
00036 using namespace msdata;
00037 
00038 
00039 ///
00040 /// simple memory cache for common MSData info
00041 ///
00042 /// Memory caching is useful to minimize data retrieval expenses:
00043 /// - disk I/O and decoding of binary data
00044 /// - indirection and pointer validation
00045 /// - parameter list searching
00046 /// - lexical casting
00047 ///
00048 /// MSDataCache is a vector of SpectrumInfo objects, but also implements the
00049 /// MSDataAnalyzer interface.  It can be used in two ways:
00050 /// 1) Updated from the outside via MSDataAnalyzer interface
00051 /// 2) Automatic updating via spectrumInfo() access method
00052 ///
00053 /// Spectrum binary data (SpectrumInfo::data) is
00054 /// freed from the cache using a LRU (least recently used) algorithm.
00055 /// Binary data will be freed only to make room for a new update.  The
00056 /// default cache size is 1, i.e. only the most recently updated binary 
00057 /// data array is stored.  Note that modifying the SpectrumInfo objects
00058 /// directly through the vector interface circumvents the LRU mechanism. 
00059 ///
00060 /// Usage #1:  MSDataCache should be placed first in an 
00061 /// MSDataAnalyzerContainer, so that it receives update() first.  Other 
00062 /// analyzers may then use it (preferably as const MSDataCache&) to access 
00063 /// spectrum data when they receive update().  On updateRequested(),
00064 /// MSDataCache returns UpdateRequest_Ok to indicate that it should
00065 /// receive any updates that are requested by other analyzers.  If no 
00066 /// other analyzer requests an update, the cache will not be updated.
00067 ///
00068 /// Usage #2:  Instantiate independently and call open() to set reference to an
00069 /// MSData object.  Calls to spectrumInfo() will return the requested SpectrumInfo,
00070 /// automatically updating the cache via call to SpectrumList::spectrum() if
00071 /// necessary.
00072 ///
00073 class MSDataCache : public std::vector<SpectrumInfo>,
00074                     public MSDataAnalyzer
00075                     
00076 {
00077     public:
00078 
00079     /// MSDataCache configuration
00080     struct Config
00081     {
00082         size_t binaryDataCacheSize;
00083         Config() : binaryDataCacheSize(1) {}
00084     };
00085 
00086     MSDataCache(const Config& config = Config());
00087 
00088     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface 
00089     //@{
00090     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00091 
00092     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00093                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const
00094     { 
00095         // receive update() only if requested by another analyzer 
00096         return MSDataAnalyzer::UpdateRequest_Ok;
00097     }
00098 
00099     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00100                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00101     //@}
00102 
00103     /// access to SpectrumInfo with automatic update (open() must be called first)
00104     const SpectrumInfo& spectrumInfo(size_t index);
00105 
00106     private:
00107     struct Impl;
00108     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00109     MSDataCache(MSDataCache&);
00110     MSDataCache& operator=(MSDataCache&);
00111 };
00112 
00113 
00114 } // namespace analysis 
00115 } // namespace pwiz

00117 
00118 #endif // _MSDATACACHE_HPP_
